sense.def:
To dodge somewhere
pomeni nenadoma se premakniti nekam, da nas nekaj ne bi zadelo, ujelo ali nas ne bi kdo videl.

seg.quote: He dodged into the post office.

sense.def:
To dodge a moving object
pomeni izogniti se premikajočemu se predmetu tako, da se v naglici odmaknemo vstran.

seg.quote: The Minister had to dodge flying tomatoes.

sense.def:
To dodge a problem
pomeni izogniti se razmišljanju o nekem problemu ali ukrepanju, da bi ga rešili.

seg.quote: This issue should not be dodged.
